Title: Regular Fiber
Description:
There is a plant fiber that grows in Rumshackle and The Fangs that makes for an excellent rope. Because of the hornets, we haven't been able to collect it in a long time and are running very low in our supplies.

While you are in the area, could you collect some?
ObjectivesCompletionText: Meet Auralia Steelstrike in Dunelle's Kindness.
CompletionText: The fibers are like magic. The ropes they make are strong, and supple.
RewardText:
Maybe your people would be interested in these fibers?

They make the best rope I have ever seen.
